Posted By: drexlor0296 (8/25/2010 9:07:47 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Actually the flavor text is rather appropriate considering mana burn was still part of the rules when this card was released. So, unless you had a [Little Girl](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Little Girl) to cast or some other way to use the extra half mana, you would end up losing a half of a life every time you tapped the C of A.
